title: Towards an application of fourth-order shear statistics II: Efficient estimation of fourth-order shear correlation functions and an application to the DES Y3 data
summary: This paper focuses on the efficient estimation of fourth-order shear correlation functions and applies this method to data from Stage-III lensing surveys, specifically the DES Y3 data, to extract cosmological information.
usefulness_reason: This paper explicitly mentions 'Stage-III lensing surveys' and 'application to the DES Y3 data', directly indicating the use and analysis of survey data in a cosmological context. While the focus is on lensing statistics, the direct reference to 'surveys' and 'data' makes it relevant to 'Survey data'.
